---
title: "Assess compliance"
date: last-modified
---

To provide an unbiased starting point that enables more efficient discussions between validators and developers, you assess compliance with guidelines based on analyzing evidence and findings.

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory.[^1]
- [x] A model developer has marked their model documentation as **Ready for Validation**.[^2]
- [x] You are a `Validator` or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^3] 

:::

## Link evidence to reports

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.[^4]

{{< include _assess-compliance-link-evidence.qmd >}}

## Link findings to reports

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.[^5]

{{< include _assess-compliance-link-finding.qmd >}}

## Provide your compliance assessments

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.[^6]

{{< include _assess-compliance-assess.qmd >}}
